New Records: Mohamed Salah limped off the field with an injury, affecting Egypt's performance
Key Match Events: A 2-2 draw after Egypt and Ghana each scored twice
Mohamed Salah left the game in the first half due to injury
Kudus scored twice, including a goal after a cooling break
Defensive errors led to Egypt's equalizer and Ghana's second goal
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana was boosted by the return of Kudus from injury
Egyptian fans showed high energy, with a cooling break boosting morale
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt's campaign was dented by Salah's injury
Ghana's performance was disappointing despite key moments
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a full stadium with a vibrant atmosphere
Only the top two teams in each group advance to the knockout stage
